M4

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • M4.SoundManager

  • public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for loading sound media to be played using an id or key. Contains all sounds for use later. 
     * User: cdea

      • loadSoundEffects
